definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Dragon boat races were held on a large scale in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 赛龙舟活动在唐朝规模很大。

sentences.english: I once went to the Dragon Boat Festival folk culture village to see the Dragon Boat race.
sentences.chinese: 我端午节有一次去民族文化村看到了赛龙舟。

sentences.english: Other than the dragon boat race, we eat ZongZi.
sentences.chinese: 除开赛龙舟，咱们还吃角黍。

sentences.english: Dragon boat racing will be headed in the world.
Boat racing has become an international sports event.
sentences.chinese: 赛龙舟已成为一个国际性运动项目。

definition: rowing competition/boat race/swimming competition (e.g. to cross river or lake)
see 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2]
Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)
Dragon Boat Festival (the 5th day of the 5th lunar month)
see 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2]
the Lantern Festival (15th of first month of lunar calendar)
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
Birthday of the Flowers, spring festival on lunar 12th or 15th February
